trans-unit.source: Creates a configured instance of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive"></xref> and <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply"></xref> activity pairs.
trans-unit.target: 구성 된 인스턴스를 만듭니다 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply"> </xref> 작업 쌍.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Presentation.Factories.ReceiveAndSendReplyFactory"></xref> class.

Creates a new <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Sequence"></xref> activity composed of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive"></xref> and a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply"></xref> pair.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Sequence"> </xref> 으로 구성 된 활동는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply"> </xref> 쌍입니다.

trans-unit.source: The workflow UI element that is the visual container of the new activity.
trans-unit.target: 새 활동의 시각 컨테이너인 워크플로 UI 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Sequence"></xref> activity composed of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive"></xref> and a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply"></xref> pair.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Sequence"> </xref> 활동으로 구성 된 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply"> </xref> 쌍입니다.
